ygData.subject: Re: Holy swords
ygData.msgSnippet: Just as professional courtesy, if anyone does know of a two-hander, could they let me know? I don t use a shield so I have been using a rusty 2hander I found
ygData.messageBody:
Just as professional courtesy, if anyone does know of a two-hander, could
they let me know? I don't use a shield so I have been using a
rusty 2hander I found when I was lvl 4. It has served me well and now my
2H slash is much higher than my 1H. Thanks :)

Reppick Paladin of the 8th order
Bertoxxulous


On Wed, 21 Apr 1999, Thang Tran wrote:

> From: "Thang Tran" <tdt7@...>
>
>
> >
> >*Hail all fellow brothers and sisters
> >*I am a 6th lvl high elf paladin of the Mith Marr server and I was
> >*wondering what holy swords are avaible to us and are they 1 handed
> or
> >*2 handed? Thanks.
> >
> >I have heard that they moved several, if not all, of our holy swords
> from
> >being 2H to 1H for the final release of the game.
> >
> >-- Amoroth, once high elf Paladin of Erollisi, but stuck with Tunare
> in
> >final
> >
> Thanks for the info. I once saw a screenshot of Aradune wearing full
> green plate and the 2 handed Fiery Avenger. Is that an only paladin
> weapon, because I heard that when they tested it in the Beta, many
> classes could use it.
>
> Elthain of Felwithe
> Paladin of Tunare
